trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> types to UI Automation.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> class.

Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ListItem" /> enumeration value.

Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
The string, "RibbonGalleryItem".
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
Gets the automation peer for the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
The automation peer for the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: Für das übergeordnete Element der Automatisierungspeer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: In all cases.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Wenn die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> , die mit dieser verknüpft ist <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> ausgewählt ist, andernfalls wird <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" /> from the collection of selected items.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: Deselects any selected items and then selects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automation peer that acts as the container for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
The automation peer that acts as the container for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Der Automatisierungspeer, die fungiert als Container für die <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Bei diesem Member handelt es sich um eine explizite Schnittstellenmember-Implementierung.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Er kann nur verwendet werden, wenn die <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemDataAutomationPeer>-Instanz in eine <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>-Schnittstelle umgewandelt wird.
